name: Gundam RX78-2 outfit style 高达RX78-2外观风格
description:
support me to buy the coffee.

欢迎查看我的其他模型：ttplanet Creator Profile | Civitai

这是一个非常平衡的lora, 可以恰如其分的展现高达的特征，但是却又可以比较好的控制权重，使用gundam\(rx78\)作为主触发词放在prompt的第一个，然后根据你使用的模型适当的调节权重从0.1-1都可以。

你可以让真人穿上高达风格的衣服，也可以通过mecha armor触发关键词直接穿上盔甲，这取决于你需要什么风格。

这个lora可以很好的和各种模型匹配，不管是真人的还是动画的！而且可以和各种其他人物lora混用！

建议使用方法是先正常的生成一个人物，调整到你喜欢的衣服和动作，调整你喜欢的场景，然后加载Lora， 如果你使用的是系统lora插件，那就直接选用添加权重，如果你不使用插件，那么就用<lora:gundamRX782OutfitStyle_v10.safetensors:1>进行触发，调整权重。

请查看我的范例图，里面是一些想法，你们可以自己玩的更high。

lora使用512*512采样生成，理论上768以下的解析度都能较好支持，建议使用hiresfix进行高清修复。想到什么再更新吧，希望能得到你们的支持。

推荐使用底模recommend SD model：

chilloutmix

Daceflopainting

AOM系列

Anything系列

以上模型都可以涩涩，如果你喜欢机甲瑟瑟的话。

This is a very balanced Lora that can perfectly showcase the features of Gundam while also allowing for good control over the weighting, use gundam\(rx78\) as the priority prompt, ranging from 0.1 to 1 depending on the model you're using.

You can have a real person wear Gundam-style clothing, or trigger keywords to directly wear mecha armor, depending on the style you prefer.

It fit will most SD model no matter it is for real person or animation.

The recommended method is to first generate a character normally, adjust their clothing and movements to your liking, adjust the scene to your liking, and then load Lora. If you're using the system Lora plugin, you can directly add weighting. If you're not using the plugin, you can trigger it with <lora:gundamRX782OutfitStyle_v10.safetensors:1> and adjust the weighting.

Please refer to my sample images for some ideas, and feel free to explore on your own.

Lora is generated at 512*512 resolution, and can support resolutions below 768 fairly well. We recommend using hiresfix for high-definition restoration. We'll update as more ideas come up, and I hope to have your support.
